reinstall_confirm.title: Replace existing Energy PDF Report
reinstall_confirm.description: An existing Energy PDF Report configuration ({title}) was found. Submit to remove it and install it again.

abort.remove_failed: Removing the existing configuration failed. Please try again from Settings > Devices & Services.
abort.already_configured: Energy PDF Report is already configured.

init.title: Energy PDF Report options
init.description: Configure the default output directory, reporting period and filename pattern used when generating PDFs.
